text: Little home based business that I was lucky to be introduced to. Auntie is experienced, knew exactly what had to be altered. Got my limited event tee resized to fit me well. Iâ€™m very happy with the results!

Two super professional and sweet ladies! They are the only people who I trust for my wedding gowns alterations or any alterations.

They fulfilled my wish of having the corset design without the hassle of tying it. Look how pretty the back is! They also modified my tea ceremony gown and it fits perfectly.

Highly recommended!

No other seamstress I asked was willing to take up this project of converting denim jeans to denim skirt. But they did and it did not disappoint! Iâ€™m quite happy with the results. Would recommend if you would want to re-fashion your older clothes ðŸ˜€

Auntie was a godsend. She saved my sister's wedding outfit, which had gotten too tight over the Covid period and required major surgery to open up so that it would be comfortable for the long wedding dinner and dancing. Auntie came up with a new idea that revamp the back of the outfit by using spare fabric from a ribbon to create a dummy back and loops. It ended up looking possibly even better than the original! And she did it in just a couple days for a very reasonable price. Thank you so much!!
My wedding dress looks so much better after alteration. Auntie is very skillful and friendly. Recommended!
